name: Vampyre
description:
Vampyre is a shoot-em up game where your goal is to vanquish vampires. Kill vampires and throw them on the pyre to fuel the fire! What high-score will you obtain?

How to Play

Left Mouse Button - Fire
Right Mouse Button - Dash
Escape - Exit Game
Collect vampires by stepping on them, and then approach the pyre to use them as fuel.

Kill Vampires and throw them on the pyre!


Dash to collect & avoid vampires!



Power-up to maximize your vampire slaying efficiency!

...And try not to die


Thank you for playing! Please leave a comment with your high-score!
